Package Utilities

package Utilities
  • Class
    Description
    Applier
    Created by ohlbach on 05.07.2019.
    BucketSortedIndex<T extends Positioned>
    This class can be used to map items to item occurrences, for example literals to literal occurrences.
    BucketSortedList<T extends Positioned>
    This class can store items according to an integer attribute 'bucket' (≥ 0).
    DiophantineEquation
    This class solves constrained diophantine equations of a particular size: n_1*x_1 + ... + n_k*x_k + y = z
    where x_i are 0 or 1 and y is constrained by 0...n
    IntegerQueue
    This class provides an alternative to PriorityQueue.
    IntegerQueueOld
    This class provides an alternative to PriorityQueue.
    Interval
    This class provides integer intervals with non-negative integers
    Positioned
    This interface can be implemented by classes which provide a position within a list, for example clauses within ArrayLists of clauses.
    SingleList<T extends Positioned>
    This class allows one to store items in an array list (unsorted).
    Sizable
    Created by ohlbach on 25.06.2019.
    TriConsumer<T,U,V>
    Created by ohlbach on 06.02.2020.
    Triple<A,B,C>
     
    Utilities
    Created by Ohlbach on 03.09.2018.
